Transformer Components
======================

Transformer components are EVM-specific implementations of Data Bus Transformers

BlockIdToEvmBlockTransformer
----------------------------

This transformer will ingest an `EvmBlockIDDataPackage` and utilize the provided EVM
RPC Client to acquire the block data necessary to create an `EvmBlock` which it will
provide to an `EvmBlockDataPackage` that it will send to the Data Bus.

Example:

.. literalinclude:: /_examples/evm_transformers_example.py
   :language: python
   :lines: 22-23,28,31-37
   :emphasize-lines: 5-9


EvmBlockToEvmTransactionHashTransformer
---------------------------------------

This transformer will ingest an `EvmBlockDataPackage` and send each of the block's
transaction hashes to the Data Bus enclosed within an `EvmTransactionHashDataPackage`.

Example:

.. literalinclude:: /_examples/evm_transformers_example.py
   :language: python
   :lines: 22-23,28,38-40
   :emphasize-lines: 5


EvmTransactionHashToEvmTransactionReceiptTransformer
----------------------------------------------------

This transformer will ingest an `EvmTransactionHashDataPackage` and utilize the provided
EVM RPC Client to acquire the transaction receipt data necessary to create an
`EvmTransactionReceipt` which it will provide to an `EvmTransactionReceiptDataPackage` that
it will send to the Data Bus.

Example:

.. literalinclude:: /_examples/evm_transformers_example.py
   :language: python
   :lines: 22-23,28,41-47
   :emphasize-lines: 5-9


EvmBlockIdToEvmBlockAndEvmTransactionAndEvmTransactionHashTransformer
---------------------------------------------------------------------

This transformer will ingest an `EvmBlockIDDataPackage` and utilize the provided
EVM RPC Client to acquire the block data data necessary to create
`EvmTransaction` objects from the block transactions which will be provided in an
`EvmTransactionDataPackage` which will be send to the Data Bus along with the
transaction hashes which were placed into `EvmTransactionHashDataPackage` objects.

Example:

.. literalinclude:: /_examples/evm_transformers_example.py
   :language: python
   :lines: 22-28,50-57
   :emphasize-lines: 9-14


EvmTransactionToContractEvmTransactionReceiptTransformer
--------------------------------------------------------

This transformer will ingest an `EvmTransactionDataPackage` and utilize the provided
EVM RPC Client to acquire the transaction receipt data necessary to create an
`EvmTransactionReceipt` which it will provide to an `EvmTransactionReceiptDataPackage` that
it will send to the Data Bus as long as the `EvmTransaction` included in the
`EvmTransactionReceiptDataPackage` is identified as a transaction in which a contract was created.

Example:

.. literalinclude:: /_examples/evm_transformers_example.py
   :language: python
   :lines: 22-23,28,58-64
   :emphasize-lines: 5-9


EvmTransactionReceiptToEvmLogTransformer
----------------------------------------

This transformer will ingest an `EvmTransactionReceiptDataPackage` and send each of
the transaction receipt's log entries as an `EvmLog` enclosed in an `EvmLogDataPackage`
to the Data Bus.

Example:

.. literalinclude:: /_examples/evm_transformers_example.py
   :language: python
   :lines: 22-23,28,67-69
   :emphasize-lines: 5



Complete Simple Example
-----------------------

.. literalinclude:: /_examples/evm_transformers_example.py
   :language: python

Executing the above example providing a RPC API Websocket URI will result in something
similar to the following being displayed in the console:
